nodes.text: Garnik was a war hero of the Republic Military from the planet Ord Mantell well before the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire. During the Cold War, the Republic named the spaceport on Avilatan, an island on Ord Mantell, Fort Garnik in Garnik's honor as they established a military garrison there.
Garnik was first mentioned in the Codex entry for Fort Garnik in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a video game released by BioWare in 2011, but the entry did not specify Garnik's gender or species.
